subject: Recursive TestRunner
msgSnippet: Hi All, Can we run a TestSuite recursively ? I have designed a set of test cases which I have added to a TestSuite. Now I want to run this TestSuite
messageBody:
Hi All,

Can we run a TestSuite recursively ?

I have designed a set of test cases which I have added to a TestSuite.
Now I want to run this TestSuite recursively.
Is there any way to do that ?
I am using junit.textui.TestRunner
I have made my TestCases in such a way that setUp and tearDown will be
called only once.
So I would not like to call them again, once the TestSuite is over.
I mean it should run with the current settings only.
I am trying to run this TestSuite as a regression test for my
application.

Thanks in advance, for your consideration in this matter.

With Regards,
Rakesh.



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
